languages.text: "Как странно, твои речи мрачны, но в душе виден всполох радости. Ты так приветствуешь меня?"

traits.locale_text: "Как странно, твои речи мрачны, но в душе виден всполох радости. Ты так приветствуешь меня?"

languages.text: "How strange. Your words are bleak, but I can see a glimmer of joy in your soul. Is this how you bid me welcome?"
languages.original_text: "Как странно, твои речи мрачны, но в душе виден всполох радости. Ты так приветствуешь меня?"

traits.locale_text: "How strange. Your words are bleak, but I can see a glimmer of joy in your soul. Is this how you bid me welcome?"
"How strange. Your words are bleak, but I can see a glimmer of joy in your soul. Is this how you bid me welcome?"
"How strange. Your words are bleak, but I can see a glimmer of joy in your soul. Is this how you bid me welcome?"
"How strange. Your words are bleak, but I can see a glimmer of joy in your soul. Is this how you bid me welcome?"
"How strange. Your words are bleak, but I can see a glimmer of joy in your soul. Is this how you bid me welcome?"
"How strange. Your words are bleak, but I can see a glimmer of joy in your soul. Is this how you bid me welcome?"

languages.text: «Qué extraño. Sus palabras son lúgubres, pero veo un destello de alegría en su alma. ¿Es esta su forma de darme la bienvenida?».
languages.original_text: "How strange. Your words are bleak, but I can see a glimmer of joy in your soul. Is this how you bid me welcome?"

languages.text: 「実におかしいわ。あなたの言葉は殺伐としているけれど、その魂には喜びの光が見える。これがあなたの歓迎方法だというの？」
languages.original_text: "How strange. Your words are bleak, but I can see a glimmer of joy in your soul. Is this how you bid me welcome?"

languages.text: “这真是太古怪了。尽管你的话语很凄凉，但我却能在你的灵魂中看到一丝喜悦，原来你是在欢迎我吗？”
languages.original_text: "How strange. Your words are bleak, but I can see a glimmer of joy in your soul. Is this how you bid me welcome?"

languages.text: "Wie seltsam. Eure Worte sind freudlos, aber ich erkenne einen Funken Freude in Eurer Seele. Heißt Ihr mich so willkommen?"
languages.original_text: "How strange. Your words are bleak, but I can see a glimmer of joy in your soul. Is this how you bid me welcome?"

languages.text: « C'est étrange, Malgré la dureté de vos paroles, je peux apercevoir une lueur de joie dans votre âme. Est-ce ainsi que vous me souhaitez la bienvenue ? »
languages.original_text: "How strange. Your words are bleak, but I can see a glimmer of joy in your soul. Is this how you bid me welcome?"
"How strange. Your words are bleak, but I can see a glimmer of joy in your soul. Is this how you bid me welcome?"

languages.text: "Ne kadar ilginç. Sözlerin kasvetli olsa da ruhunda neşe parıltısı görüyorum. Bu bana hoş geldin deme şeklin mi?"
languages.original_text: "How strange. Your words are bleak, but I can see a glimmer of joy in your soul. Is this how you bid me welcome?"
